introduction.title: Welcome to MediScan
introduction.description: MediScan is your personal medication assistant, helping you understand your medications, manage your health records, and get answers to your medical questions.
introduction.guide: Follow this guide to learn how to use all the features of MediScan effectively.

scanning.title: Scanning Medications
scanning.description: Learn how to scan medications and get accurate information

step1.title: Open Scanner
step1.description: Tap on the scanner icon in the bottom navigation

step2.title: Position Medication
step2.description: Place the medication packaging in the camera frame

step3.title: Take Photo
step3.description: Tap the capture button to take a clear photo

step4.title: Review Results
step4.description: View the detailed information about your medication

chatting.title: Chatting with MediScan AI
chatting.description: Get answers to your medical questions from our AI

step1.title: Start a Chat
step1.description: Tap on the chat option from the home screen or bottom navigation

step2.title: Ask Your Question
step2.description: Type your health or medication question in the text field

step3.title: Get AI Response
step3.description: Receive a detailed response based on reliable medical information

step4.title: Follow Up
step4.description: Ask follow-up questions to get more specific information

healthRecords.title: Managing Health Records
healthRecords.description: Keep track of your medications and health data

step1.title: Access Health Records
step1.description: Navigate to the Health Records section from the home screen

step2.title: Add New Record
step2.description: Tap the + button to add a new medication or health record

step3.title: Set Reminders
step3.description: Configure medication reminders for timely intake

step4.title: View History
step4.description: Access your complete health and medication history

gold.title: MediScan Gold Features
gold.description: Upgrade to Gold for premium features

step1.title: Unlimited Scans
step1.description: Scan medications without any daily limits

step2.title: Priority Support
step2.description: Get faster responses from our support team

step3.title: Advanced AI Features
step3.description: Access to more detailed AI analysis and recommendations

step4.title: Family Accounts
step4.description: Manage multiple profiles for family members
